channel.title: Blog from Scratch
channel.description: Recent content on Blog from Scratch

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: Before I begin to dive into the topic of building a blog from scratch in subsequent posts I think a little explanation on who I am and why I am writing this. But here is a little DISCLAIMER beforehead: This blog is foremost intended as my personal thought collection and won’t have any topics that are exclusively covered (though it will probably start with building this blog from scratch). Also it does not follow any schedule.
